posts.post_content:
To have a good laugh, that's all this is good for.
  
*At night he perfected his aim...* I wonder how skillful his aim was before he practiced. Something like: "![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Tap](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=tap&type=symbol): Takeno's Cavalry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking [Aven Trooper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aven Trooper)." Stay in the night so nobody has to see you again.
posts.html:
To have a good laugh, that's all this is good for.
At night he perfected his aim... I wonder how skillful his aim was before he practiced. Something like: ": Takeno's Cavalry deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking Aven Trooper." Stay in the night so nobody has to see you again.

Posted By: holgir (8/12/2009 6:01:39 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This card is kind of depressing. Any of you read the Kamigawa novels? This card's flavor is pretty awesome. Why does it have to be so damn terrible? In fact, that's the one part that's off. Takeno had extremely well trained men. A 1/1? Get out of here with that.   
  
As a 3/3 he'd be playable, with an ability that is pretty marginal these days. The same would be true if he cost 1W, and stayed as a 1/1. Considering the importance of spirits in his block's makeup, I'd even accept 2W as a cost, or 2/2 as his P/T.  
  
But right now, he's jut no good. I rated it a 1.5/5 because he does at least have some good synergy with other cards due to his Samurai type.
posts.html:
This card is kind of depressing. Any of you read the Kamigawa novels? This card's flavor is pretty awesome. Why does it have to be so damn terrible? In fact, that's the one part that's off. Takeno had extremely well trained men. A 1/1? Get out of here with that.

As a 3/3 he'd be playable, with an ability that is pretty marginal these days. The same would be true if he cost 1W, and stayed as a 1/1. Considering the importance of spirits in his block's makeup, I'd even accept 2W as a cost, or 2/2 as his P/T.

But right now, he's jut no good. I rated it a 1.5/5 because he does at least have some good synergy with other cards due to his Samurai type.
